document.full_text: troops recaptured a pakistani naval air force base on monday after a 16-hour battle with as few as six taliban gunmen who had launched their attack to avenge the killing of osama bin laden.
document.title: pakistan retakes naval base after attack
lines_and_colors: troops recaptured a pakistani naval air force base on monday after a 16-hour battle with as few as six taliban gunmen who had launched their attack to avenge the killing of osama bin laden.
